2015-10-20: UTX stock increased by 2.48% to 94.33 in pre-market trading due to beating Q3 EPS expectations by 0.12 and approving a 12B common stock buyback.
Pre-market gains in TRV, UTX, and BA are offsetting IBM weakness but volume remains low.
Strength observed in PFE, PG, TRV, UTX, UNH, VZ, and WMT contributing to market trends.
Defensive trading on Tuesday for the stock market amid mixed earnings reports impacting DIS, IBM, TRV, UTX, and YUM.
Notable increases today for industrial stocks, including Dover at +6.5% and United Technologies at +4.3%, benefiting dividend portfolios.
